issue.title: [CF 1376] Conditions Not Showing
issue.body:
Image

 

Tried fixes:

Re-downloading TMW.

Turning off all addons.

Turning off game and restarting with just TMW.

Deleting cache.

Removing saved .lua and .lua.bak from SavedVariables (checking also individual character settings).

 

Image is interact-able. What happens when clicked, Image.

 

I tried as much as I can think of.

 

What works:

Everything but conditions page.


> Posted by CurseForge user Watcher56 | Imported from CurseForge issue #1376 | Raw

comments.body:
Please include the export string of your profile, as well as any global groups you use. Also include any relevant screenshots, and any error messages you're getting. If you don't already have an addon to handle Lua errors, please install BugSack and load up the game with it before responding. You almost certainly are getting errors that you aren't telling me about, probably because you aren't seeing them.

Edited Feb 13, 2017

> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

Point taken, i forgot about that. Put on Advanced Interface Options, turned on LUA errors < realised this was why I forgot, because it wasnt normally in the Interface options to turn it on and off anymore. Was still off from pre-7.0.

 

Don't have any imported groups, so no globals. This conditions issue was happening with TMW being blank after just installing.

 

All addons off but TMW and Bug grabber/sack. Came in a breakdown of 8 parts < so, everything with an enter between = a new grab it says.

 

Tried to open the group config too, to make sure you got the bug popup for it in here.
